summary: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.
cast: Jane Levy|Shiloh Fernandez|Lou Taylor Pucci|Jessica Lucas|Elizabeth Blackmore|Phoenix Connolly|Jim McLarty|Sian Davis|Stephen Butterworth|Karl Willetts|Randal Wilson|Rupert Degas|Bob Dorian|Ellen Sandweiss|Inca|Bruce Campbell
title: Posesión infernal
